pr_title: New way to make patch releases

timeline.message: New way to make patch releases
New way to make patch releases

timeline.bodyText:
comment update, and I really hope we never have 10 patch releases for one version, but just in case 😭

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                          # Only for major and minor releases
          
          
            
                          only: /^v.*\.[1-9]+$/
          
          
            
                          # Only for patch releases
          
          
            
                          only: /^v.*\.[1-9][0-9]*$/
